<strong></strong> This beautiful two bedroom conversion property is located within the popular Finlay's Warehouse on Dale Street. Positioned on the second floor, this corner apartment has a spacious entrance hall which leads round to an open plan living area which has dual aspect views and a fitted kitchen with integrated appliances and a breakfast bar. There are two spacious double bedrooms, both have built-in full height wardrobes and the master has an ensuite shower room. There is a main three piece bathroom with additional storage space above. The apartment faces onto Dale Street and has original features throughout with high ceilings, exposed brick walls, feature brick fire-places and iron columns and beams. <br /><br />Finlay's Warehouse is a National RIBA award winning development, this grade II listed 19th century cotton warehouse was converted into 27 loft apartments by a multiple award winning architect.
